lesson1_culture_1.character: When Japanese give their name, they give their _____ name first.
options: family
given
middle

lesson1_culture_1.character: The Japanese give their _____ name last.
options: given
family
middle
middle
family
given

lesson1_culture_1.character: When Japanese introduce themselves, they often say only their family name.
options: true
false

lesson1_culture_1.character: Most Japanese names are written in _____.
options: Kanji
Hiragana
Katakana

lesson1_culture_1.character: Family names are often related to _____.
options: nature or geographical features
life or death
myths or legends

lesson1_culture_1.character: Because many kanji share the same reading, names with the same pronunciation may be written with different kanji.
options: true
false
メアリーさんはアメリカじんです。
メアリーさんはアメリカです。
メアリーさんアメリカじんです。
lesson1_grammar_1.answer: メアリーさんはアメリカじんです。
